name: Rogue Flite (working title) - demo
description:
Pushed to the edge of a hostile galaxy by the neo-fascist SCAR (Star Capital of Ass Republic? IDK) it's time to fight your way back to the heart which belongs to you.

Currently the project is in the proof-of-concept stage, I hope you enjoy this demo!

Game must be played with a controller, but any controller should work!
